website_summaries.verdict: Achieve all the glamorous drama of a false lash without all of the work.
pros: The prime-and-seal mascara uses tiny fibers to dramatically lengthen lashes
Directions are easy to follow for beginners
Formula is smudge-proof and thickens lashes in addition to lengthening them
cons: Applying too much of the fibers may cause a flaky effect

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you're a spider lover!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great if you love spiders! If you love spiders so much you want your eyes to look like the legs of a dozen spiders, this is for you! Guaranteed to make your lashes clumpy, stick together, and have weird zigzags. Just like real spider legs! If you're not a fan of that look, this product is probably one to skip. I didn't think it did much for me beyond what a normal decent mascara would, it was a pain to use, and ended up kind of clumpy and gross. def wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can add volume and length to my lashes so easily!
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lashes for days !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I don't wear any makeup besides mascara, so I'm ecstatic that I finally found one that wears well. Doesn't clump and easy to use. The only downer is after 2 months I'm ordering another one because the small tube with fibers is running on empty while I still have plenty of the actual mascara left. Another good thing is it stays on all day. I don't believe it's waterproof, but normally I'd have racoon eyes by the end of the day if i don't buy waterproof, but this holds up all day and washes off with just warm water when you wash your face at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Preciosa

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to false eye lashes
customer_reviews.text: It's nice. My eyelashes do look pretty glam. The solution especially the white stuff takes some getting used to. I think anything you use to augment your look takes some time to learn how to use it. This product does what it says it advertises. You simply have to learn to use it to get the look YOU want. Good alternative to false eyelashes.
customer_reviews.author: Esther D

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan, will go back to other Mascara. The smaller tube is like putting lint on my lashes. It does work but have had others that work just as well if not better.
customer_reviews.author: cfc928

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Insanely plumping! I'm in love! Easy to apply, clear instructions and lasts ALL DAY! No dripping, smudging or flaking.
customer_reviews.author: Shiz

customer_reviews.title: Terrible..
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this product I was so excited. To be just disappointed. The primer bottle is completely bone dry. Nothing inside... The mascara bottle hardly had product in it.. I wouldn't recommend..
customer_reviews.author: TinaKaiser

customer_reviews.title: Ran out too quick
customer_reviews.text: The lash fibers ran out extremely fast.. the regular Better Than Sex mascara is better
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite mascara! Unfortunately, Sephora stopped carrying it. Although a bit pricey, I just cannot break from using it.!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Push

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty good. The fibers get into your eyes if you don’t put enough of a coating on it which can be annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: The mascara was dried up upon opening this morning. This is the only mascara I wear, and it’s been sold out online for weeks was happy when I found it here even though it was $15 more than normal was more than willing to pay that, expected the same quality as always.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: Unusable.
customer_reviews.text: This product came in completely dried out. Like it had been 5 years old. I’ve ordered this several times before and it’s never like that. Completely defective item. Unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Jill S. Garlich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but not certain I'll purchase again. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie J Evans Coontz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: BEST PRODUCT EVER! MUCH BETTER THAN ALL THE REST, AND I'VE TRIED MANY..
customer_reviews.author: SUE CORYELL

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend. Not happy with product
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t recommend. Not happy with product. I don’t notice any difference in my lashes
customer_reviews.author: Tomi Petersen

customer_reviews.title: It works like it says
customer_reviews.text: It works like it says...however it is very flaky and flaked off alot...I only use it when going out for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kay Lansing

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The mascara itself is fine. The white product that supposed to cost the lashes was dried out. For me it's not worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: michelle morgan

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I will never understand why companies think they have to improve an item that doesn't need improvement. This was the best mascara I ever used. It really made my lashes long and full without ever clumping. So I figured the new formulation would be even better. I was wrong. If you want your lashes to look like Tammy Faye Bakker, buy this mascara. It is TERRIBLE!! I would give it no stars if that was possible.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt M

customer_reviews.title: Flaky & clumpy
customer_reviews.text: I was not at all impressed. I was better off using drug store mascara. As soon as I opened it it was clumpy. There was visible difference in the appearance of my lashes except a really bad application. I don't recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: goodnitesaigon

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh...
customer_reviews.text: For the money, I don't think it is worth it. I get a similar result with a few layers of regular mascara. If you're looking for a more affordable 3D fiber mascara try Cat Eyes 3D fiber. The results were way better. Now, this mascara isn't terrible, but the money I spent on it makes me cringe at the poor results.
customer_reviews.author: Kara West

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me. I applied 3 coats and still lashes were no longer than before applying.
customer_reviews.author: Pepperstein

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy online again but LOVE this brand when I buy at Ulta or Sophia
customer_reviews.author: teacher

customer_reviews.title: Fine But Not Amazing
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, but not as amazing as I expected. I actually like their Better Than Sex mascara better.
customer_reviews.author: Kim In Kansas

customer_reviews.title: Great product, ordering another package
customer_reviews.text: My 22 year old daughter uses this product. She loves it and just asked me to order another package. It's lasted her almost 2 months which is pretty darn good. This product works well with the heat and humidity of the summer.
customer_reviews.author: KVNMOM

customer_reviews.title: Not in love, but it's good
customer_reviews.text: Not as Amazon as another fiber lash mascara I have used, but it's decent. Difficult to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C.

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever tried, and I've tried them all!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried SO MANY of these fiber mascara sets, it's crazy how much money I wasted. THIS ONE is excellent, it really gives me the longer and thicker lashes I've been lusting after. It's easy to use. I love the fibers being white, it's much easier to see where they're placed so you can make perfect lashes. It has pretty good staying power too, does not flake or smear. If I'm going to be getting super sweaty I put a final coat of waterproof mascara over it and I'm good all day long. PLEASE, never stop making this mascara set!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! My lashes do not clump together and my lashes look thicker and longer.
customer_reviews.author: KatieGray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Never have I had such long full lashes. Im obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: no for me
customer_reviews.text: did not do anything different to my lashes than cheaper brands
customer_reviews.author: paula vines

customer_reviews.title: I love the fiber
customer_reviews.text: I love the fiber, it does extend my lashes and isn't clumpy but I don't like the formula of the mascara
customer_reviews.author: klive

customer_reviews.title: This was dried up and useless!!!
customer_reviews.text: The fiber tube was full but the mascara tube was all dried up.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the new formula
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed....I used the previous version of this mascara and loved it. They have changed the formula (i.e. Extreme) and it doesn't work for me. The base mascara doesn't seem to have the same "tackiness" as the original formula. I curl my lashes because they are short, and when I apply the base mascara, it straightens them out instead of holding them firm. I received a sample of Better Than Sex mascara, it's decent, but doesn't give me the length I'm looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Scarborough

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware. Don't use.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. After one use, my normally long and full eye lashes are broken down to the quick. They are literally broken n half at some points along my lash line. A friend had the exact same experience. Be careful!!
customer_reviews.author: Allyssa DelPiano

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, looks natural and pretty. I don't wear a regular mascara before this product. However, I remember I paid about 20 bucks around last Xmas, and this now is double the price!
customer_reviews.author: TY

customer_reviews.title: Worked great first time then junk
customer_reviews.text: This worked great the first use. Every use after, it got worse and worse. The fibers do not stay on your lashes. As soon as I used the black over the fibers, they would come right back off onto the brush. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl

product_meta.title: Too Faced Better Than False Lashes Extreme 0.29 oz
product_meta.description: Say good-bye to the difficulty, stress and hassle of false lashes with Too Faced's instant lash extension kit! They've improved their best-selling Better Than False Lashes with a supercharged Prime & Seal Mascara that dries quickly, a duo-fiber spiral brush to capture every last lash and advanced sculpting nylon fibers for an extreme length, false lash look made easy.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
